item.title: Shout Outs by Spencer O.
item.description: This is where I shoutout my super talented friends and other up-and-comers who are making amazing things. Everything shared with permission. Mr. Facet Mr. Facet Cold Worked Glass Art Hamy (Hamilton) Hamy is a self-described creative technologist, and the name couldn’t better apply. Hamy is a socially conscious engineer, builder, creator, entrepreneur, and artist. He actively updates his findings and learnings in life in his blog, and is an established and dedicated (digital artist)[https://labs.
